name: Sapling Supplies
description: Gather vital materials so the Kweebec saplings can reinforce their village platforms.

objectives.description: Collect Ancient Bark from nearby groves.
Find Sunstone Shards from crystal caches.

name: Trork Raiding Party
description: Push back the Trork raiders threatening Kweebec trade routes.

objectives.description: Defeat Feral Trorks lurking near the paths.

name: Skysong Research
description: Assist the Skysong scholars by retrieving rare arcane materials.

objectives.description: Secure Orbis Crystals from crystal caverns.
Distill a Focus Elixir for the research team.

name: Borea Defense
description: Support the Borea Stormguard by crafting gear and defeating icebound threats.

objectives.description: Forge a Steel Sword for the Stormguard.
Spar with a Stormguard veteran to test your mettle.

name: Void Incursion
description: Disrupt the Varyn incursion by striking at their elite forces.

objectives.description: Defeat Void Knights patrolling the corruption zones.
Silence the Voidcallers summoning reinforcements.

name: Ember Cavern Expedition
description: Delve into the volcanic caverns and defeat their fiery guardians.

objectives.description: Slay an Emberdrake within the magma vents.
Retrieve a Luminite Core from the cavern.

name: Dungeon Delver
description: Complete a Shadow Depths dungeon run and bring back the spoils.

objectives.description: Clear the Shadow Depths dungeon.

name: Brewmaster's Path
description: Demonstrate your brewing prowess to the Howling Sands caravans.

objectives.description: Brew Ember Ale for the caravan camp.
Distill a Focus Elixir as a desert tonic.

name: Storm Forge
description: Craft advanced gear and defeat elite foes across Orbis.

objectives.description: Craft a Skyseer Talisman at an arcane table.
Defeat the Ashen Colossus guarding the molten plateau.

name: Champion of Orbis
description: Prove your mastery across factions by completing varied feats.

objectives.description: Defeat a Varyn Warlord leading the incursion.
Clear the Shadow Depths twice to secure the region.
Craft Guardian Bulwark armor for the final defense.

name: Aurora Harvest
description: Aid the Skysong in harnessing aurora light for their archives.

objectives.description: Collect Aurora Fragments under the shimmering skies.
Defeat Aurora Watchers guarding the Luminite caches.

name: Scarlet Cleanse
description: Purge Trork warbands from the scarlet forest that borders the Kweebec grove.

objectives.description: Defeat a Trork Siege Breaker leading the assault.
Eliminate Trork Shamans empowering the raid.

name: Stormguard Convoy
description: Escort the Stormguard convoy through blizzard-choked passes.

objectives.description: Clear Frostclaw ambushes along the convoy route.
Secure the stronghold that oversees the pass.

name: Tidecaller Council
description: Win the favor of the Tidecaller Council by preserving their sanctums.

objectives.description: Cleanse the Sunken Cathedral of void corruption.
Retrieve a Sunken Pearl for the council.

name: Emberforge Alliance
description: Earn the trust of the Ancient Guardians by restoring the Emberforge.

objectives.description: Defeat the Ashen Colossus guarding the Emberforge.
Forge an Emberstorm Bow as a sign of alliance.

name: Aurora Architect
description: Construct a resonance array that channels aurora energy.

objectives.description: Craft a Skyseer Talisman as the array core.
Harvest Aurora Fragments to fuel the array.

name: Voidbreak Vanguard
description: Lead a strike team into the Voidheart and sever the titan's tether.

objectives.description: Defeat the Void Titan at the heart of the citadel.
Harvest void essence samples for the Skysong.

name: Nomad Pilgrimage
description: Accompany the caravan on its sacred pilgrimage and defend it from threats.

objectives.description: Drive off predators stalking the caravan.
Prepare Sandroot Stew to sustain the travelers.

name: Warden of the Wilds
description: Restore balance in the Wyrmroot Hollow by aiding its guardians.

objectives.description: Cull serpents poisoning the wyrm springs.
Defeat the Vinebound Titan menacing the grove.

name: Archivist Accord
description: Assemble a codex of Orbis by collecting relics from across the world.

objectives.description: Gather aurora fragments for the archives.
Collect pearls from the Tidecaller sanctums.
Secure void essences for containment studies.

name: Skybreaker Ascension
description: Earn the right to don the Skybreaker Regalia by reforging storm power.

objectives.description: Forge a Skybreaker Halberd within the bastion forges.
Plate warsteel with stormglass to fashion the regalia.
Braid a torque that stabilises lightning surges.
Defeat Skybreaker Guardians in the floating bastions.
Clear Stormguard Keep to prove mastery over the tempests.

name: Ember Rift Resurgence
description: Reignite the Emberlost foundry and awaken its legendary arsenal.

objectives.description: Temper a blade within the Ember Rift crucibles.
Weave a hauberk from living slag embers.
Brew draughts that let you stride molten rivers.
Defeat Emberlost Forgemasters to stabilise the foundry.

name: Verdant Reclamation
description: Cleanse the Verdant Moors and bond with the living ward.

objectives.description: Grow armour interwoven with fenlife.
Shape fenfire charms into a verdant brooch.
Harvest verdant pollen to heal the moors.
Calm the shaman stirring chaotic growth.

name: Celestial Alignment
description: Chart the starpaths and weave the Celestial Convergence.

objectives.description: String a longbow with comet threads.
Stitch raiment from starlit cords.
Gather celestial thread along the escarpment.
Align the Crystal Sanctuary to skysong frequencies.

name: Abyssal Coronation
description: Earn the blessing of the deep to wield abyssal sovereignty.

objectives.description: Forge a scepter in the pressure of the abyss.
Assemble carapace plates tempered undersea.
Defeat Abyssal Goliaths rising from the trench.
Cleanse the Sunken Cathedral of void rifts.

name: Runebound Convergence
description: Synchronise the void wards to complete the Runebound Bulwark.

objectives.description: Forge a barrier harness from wardstone fragments.
Carve a focus that refracts spells safely.
Harvest runic embers stabilising the hollows.
Grind glyph powder from newly etched wards.
Seal the Voidheart Citadel once more.
